label: Vision & Mission
heading: Vision & Mission of the Department
description: To nurture globally competent data science professionals with analytical thinking, innovation, ethical values, and the ability to extract insights for solving real-world problems for the betterment of society.

sections.heading: Mission of the Department
items: M1: To impart industry-aligned education in Data Science, focusing on analytics, statistics, computational skills, and ethical data practices.
M2: To enhance research and problem-solving abilities using Data Science tools, techniques, and methodologies for societal benefit.
M3: To encourage students towards higher education, innovation, entrepreneurship, and responsible use of data.
M4: To provide exposure to emerging technologies in AI, Machine Learning, Big Data, and Data Engineering platforms while upholding integrity and transparency in data handling.
